Key Match Events: Pakistan lost to Zimbabwe by 1 run in the final ball of the over
Zimbabwe defended 11 runs in the final over to secure a nerve-wracking win
Post-Match Reflections: Wasim Akram expressed disappointment with Pakistan's loss
Shoaib Akhtar criticized the team and its management, calling them 'average'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan's loss may make it difficult for them to reach the semi-finals
South Africa and India are in prime position to qualify through to the semi-finals
Others: Pakistan's team had previously lost a game in the final ball against India in their tournament opener
